title: appveyor fails to annex init for v6 in test_add_recursive
body:
Fresh failure on appveyor https://ci.appveyor.com/project/mih/datalad/builds/23566971/job/k617r2yxoprmg547, smells like just some instability in annex since none other test fails on this basic operation?

```
======================================================================
ERROR: datalad.core.local.tests.test_save.test_add_recursive
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\nose\case.py", line 198, in runTest
    self.test(*self.arg)

    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)

    self.gen.throw(type, value, traceback)

    yield filename

    return t(*(arg + (filename,)), **kw)
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\core\local\tests\test_save.py", line 486, in test_add_recursive
    parent = Dataset(path).rev_create()

    return f(**kwargs)

  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\interface\utils.py", line 429, in generator_func
    result_renderer, result_xfm, _result_filter, **_kwargs):
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\interface\utils.py", line 522, in _process_results
    for res in results:
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\core\local\create.py", line 313, in __call__
    fake_dates=fake_dates
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\support\repo.py", line 146, in __call__
    instance = type.__call__(cls, *new_args, **new_kwargs)
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\support\annexrepo.py", line 256, in __init__
    self._init(version=version, description=description)
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\support\annexrepo.py", line 1157, in _init
    annex_options=opts)

    env=env, **kwargs)
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\support\gitrepo.py", line 1866, in _run_command_files_split
    *args, **kwargs)
  File "C:\Miniconda35\envs\test-environment\lib\site-packages\datalad\cmd.py", line 691, in run
```
